name: Anna Doll - Dress Up Game
description:
Chibi Girl - Princess Game is extremely attractive new game where you can create your perfect chibi doll with many outfits, items, backgrounds, speech bubbles and decorate your room.

In our Anna Doll Dress Up Game, you can dress your own star girl character style. Let's have a relaxing time creating your own chibi and adorable pastel doll girls or boys. Surprise your friends, unleash imagination and upgrade your creative skills!

Special Features Of Chibi Girl - Avatar Maker
• Choose different skin tones, hair styles, eye colors, hair colors and more stylish dresses with more than 1000 decoration items.
• Premium costumes make your doll more special.
• Decorate avatars and backgrounds or become an avatar creator for yourself or whatever you like.
• Create your own stories using your favorite chibi dolls
• Share it on fashion apps, social media to get more likes for your chibi doll and boost all followers.

Now you can make your own character so easily and show it to your friends. Or even better, you can be the best super stylist or fashion stylist. Download Anna Doll Dress Up Game - Chibi Girl & Princess Game and blow your creativity.
